properties.title: Summersville Lake
properties.description: Best beginner area — 13 V0-V3 problems, flat landings. 35-40 min from Fayetteville. Rain resilience: Poor (exposed). [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Meadow River
properties.description: Rain-day backup — sheltered overhangs, short approaches. 35-40 min from Fayetteville. Rain resilience: Good. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Gorge Boulders
properties.description: Best rain shelter — cliff-base overhangs stay dry. 5-15 min from Fayetteville. Rain resilience: Good-Fair. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Arrowhead Trails
properties.description: Primary MTB — 10-13 mi singletrack, green to black. 5-10 min from Fayetteville. Free access. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Summit Bechtel Reserve
properties.description: Premium MTB — 30-40 mi trail, green to double black. 12-18 min from Fayetteville. ⚠️ MUST call (304) 465-2800 — access NOT guaranteed. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Babcock State Park
properties.description: Scenic backup MTB — 5-10 mi old roads and railroad grades. 30-35 min from Fayetteville. Call (304) 438-3004 for road access. [UNVERIFIED]

properties.title: Fayetteville
properties.description: Base town — lodging, dining, gear shops, groceries. All drives measured from here.
